refnamediv.refpurpose: Normalize array to a given range

varlistentry.listitem: and lower range limits of N. lower defaults to 0. upper defaults to 1.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Function normal normalizes a matrix M to occupy lowerupper range. The intent of this function is to be a shortcut to a simple but often used operation.
N = normal(M) normalizes N to 0-1 range.
N = normal(M,upper) normalizes N to 0-upper range.
N = normal(M,upper,lower) normalizes N to lower-upper range.
